SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.Levels

Class UIManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.Levels.UIManager
public class UIManager extends Object
UIManager handles the management and updating of the game's user interface elements such as the score, kill count, and scoreboard.

      Parameters:

      targetKillCount - The target kill count to show in the display.
